title: Electric force - force from two charges on third

content.question: What is the magnitude of the net electric force exerted on the middle sphere with charge <math alttext="positive q" overflow="scroll"> <mo>+</mo> <mi>q</mi> </math> by the other two spheres?

choices.label: <math alttext="five halves times the fraction with numerator k q squared, and denominator d squared" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><mn>5</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mfrac><mrow><mi>k</mi><msup><mi>q</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><msup><mi>d</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mfrac></math>

<math alttext="3 times the fraction with numerator k q squared, and denominator d squared" overflow="scroll"><mn>3</mn><mfrac><mrow><mi>k</mi><msup><mi>q</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><msup><mi>d</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mfrac></math>

<math alttext="7 times the fraction with numerator k q squared, and denominator d squared" overflow="scroll"><mn>7</mn><mfrac><mrow><mi>k</mi><msup><mi>q</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><msup><mi>d</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mfrac></math>

<math alttext="8 times the fraction with numerator k q squared, and denominator d squared" overflow="scroll"><mn>8</mn><mfrac><mrow><mi>k</mi><msup><mi>q</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><msup><mi>d</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mfrac></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="3 times the fraction with numerator k q squared, and denominator d squared" overflow="scroll"><mn>3</mn><mfrac><mrow><mi>k</mi><msup><mi>q</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><msup><mi>d</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mfrac></math>

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
